title: DOA: Dead or Alive
occurrences: Welcome to the world's greatest martial arts tournament, DOA.
- Why do you follow me? - I was invited to DOA.
or how you got yourself invited to DOA,
And if I get to put your double-dealing arse in the "D" column of "Dead or Alive",

Welcome to DOA. Glad you made it.
DOA combatants, your host, Dr. Victor Donovan.

Once you pass your physicals, DOA begins.

No weapons are allowed in a DOA fight, except the human weapon.
